name: HELIPISTAS, S.L
about: HELIPISTAS, S.L is a premier helicopter flight school dedicated to providing high-quality, comprehensive training for aspiring helicopter pilots. Located in Spain, we offer a range of programs tailored to individual needs, including Private Pilot License (PPL(H)) and commercial pilot training. Our curriculum includes both theoretical and practical components, with a focus on safety, proficiency, and career readiness. We utilize state-of-the-art aircraft and simulators, ensuring students gain extensive flight experience. Our experienced instructors provide personalized guidance, supporting each student's journey to become a confident and skilled helicopter pilot. With a commitment to excellence and a student-centric approach, HELIPISTAS, S.L is the ideal choice for those seeking a professional and fulfilling career in aviation. We are dedicated to helping you achieve your aviation dreams.
services: ["PPL(H) Private Helicopter Pilot Course\nCPL(H) Commercial Helicopter Pilot Course\nHelicopter type ratings"]
